pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)64$(br)$(#bd951a)Damage:$()$(#ff0000)7$(br)$(#bd951a)Speed:$()$(#ff0000)Slow$(br2)$(#bd951a)Backup Dancer Zombie spent six years perfecting his art at the Chewliard Performing Arts School in Zombie New York City.

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)These zombies appear in sets of four whenever Dancing Zombie rocks out.
